Learn how to monitor and manage CKD effe: Koyi yadda ake lura da sarrafa CKD yadda ya kamata. Lafiyarku ita ce muhimmancinmu.
Chronic Kidney Disease (CKD) is a condit: Chronic Kidney Disease (CKD) na nufin rashin aiki na koda wanda ke faruwa a hankali a cikin lokaci. Gano da kuma sarrafa shi da wuri yana da mahimmanci wajen hana matsaloli. Dandalinmu yana bayar da albarkatu da dama don taimaka wa mutane da masu bada kulawa na lafiya don sarrafa CKD.
Learn the steps you can take to reduce t: Koyi matakan da za ka iya dauka don rage haɗarin CKD, ciki har da kiyaye lafiyar jiki, shan ruwa da kyau, da kuma duba lafiya akai-akai.
Get tools and insights to track kidney h: Samun kayan aikin da zasu taimaka wajen lura da lafiyar koda, nazarin alamomi, da kuma bibiyar lafiyar ku gaba daya.
Access detailed information about treatm: Samun cikakken bayani game da tsare-tsaren magani, gyaran yanayin rayuwa, da kuma shawarwarin kwararru da aka tsara musamman ga bukatunku.
